DOC.brief_summary: The major objective present study examine influence normobaric hyperoxia treatment symptom patient diagnosed depression member Clalit Health Services . The investigator hypothesize normobaric hyperoxia treatment improve symptom patient depression .
DOC.criteria: Men woman age 1865 year diagnose mild moderate depression . Patients oxygen saturation 95 % ; An unstable mental ( psychiatric ) condition A psychiatric condition require change pharmacotherapy ( importantly medication change patient enrol study ) Acute chronic respiratory disease Any severe physical illness Suicidal thought attempt Drug abuse Obesity ( BMI 30 ) Inability cease smoke night hour participant suppose use oxygen/air supplement machine .
